external_database.name: NIAGADS
external_database.description: NIAGADS is the National Institute on Aging Genetics of Alzheimer's Disease Data Storage Site. NIAGADS is a national genetics repository created by NIA to facilitate access by qualified investigators to genotypic data for the study of genetics of late-onset Alzheimer's disease.

MEM.name: Memory predominant AD subgroup
MEM.description: summary statistics from a case-control analyses of a memory predominant Alzheimer’s disease subgroup

VSP.name: Visuospatial predominant AD subgroup
VSP.description: summary statistics from a case-control analyses of a visuospatial predominant Alzheimer’s disease subgroup

LANG.name: Language predominant AD subgroup
LANG.description: summary statistics from a case-control analyses of a language predominant Alzheimer’s disease subgroup

NONE.name: No domain-specific substantial cognitive impairment AD subgroup
NONE.description: summary statistics from a case-control analyses of an Alzheimer’s disease subgroup with no domains (memory, visuospatial, language) of substantial relative cognitive impairment

MIX.name: Multiple substantial cognitive impairments AD subgroup
MIX.description: summary statistics from a case-control analyses of an Alzheimer’s disease subgroup with multiple domains (memory, visuospatial, language) of substantial cognitive impairment

parameters.name: Cognitively defined late-onset Alzheimer’s disease subgroups
parameters.description: GWAS meta-analysis summary statistics for case-control analyses of five cognitively defined Alzheimer’s disease subgroups, assigned on the basis of relative performance in memory, executive functioning, visuospatial functioning, and language at the time of Alzheimer’s disease diagnosis.
